item.title: Acer Aspire Vero (Antichrist)
item.description: The only thing more stupid than making a laptop out of cheap recycled plastic is the idea that anyone would buy it.

item.title: Paradisus-Paradoxum Collection
item.description: It's an undeniable fact that i'm the worlds biggest fan of MYTH & ROID's hit 2016 single Paradisus-Paradoxum. I've listened to it multiple times every day for around 2.5 years. Naturally, I have come across many covers and variations on the original, for which I have contained on this webpage

item.title: How I Created the Travelers of Agora Road Webring
item.description: The Travelers of Agora Road webring has grown to 20 members, so I thought I would explain the process of creating it, along with the resources I used.
